title: Google\Cloud\Bigtable\V2\ReadRowsRequest
name: ReadRowsRequest
description:
Request message for Bigtable.ReadRows.

Generated from protobuf message google.bigtable.v2.ReadRowsRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.table_name
params.description: Required. The unique name of the table from which to read. Values are of the form projects/<project>/instances/<instance>/tables/<table>.

params.name: data.app_profile_id
params.description: This value specifies routing for replication. This API only accepts the empty value of app_profile_id.

params.name: data.rows
params.description: The row keys and/or ranges to read sequentially. If not specified, reads from all rows.

params.name: data.filter
params.description: The filter to apply to the contents of the specified row(s). If unset, reads the entirety of each row.

params.name: data.rows_limit
params.description: The read will stop after committing to N rows' worth of results. The default (zero) is to return all results.

params.name: data.request_stats_view
params.description: The view into RequestStats, as described above.
